## Description {#details}

The root is the trivial <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/json/path">Path</a> to the root value.

It also stores the latest reported error and the path where it occurred.

Definition at line 702 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/json-h">JSON.h</a>.
